item.title: No Deal with Iran Despite Reports of
item.description: From Iran talks, no deal. U.S. military positioned in Middle East. In Knesset speech, India's PM Narendra Modi supports Israel. Analysis: Amb. Danny Danon, Kenneth Abramowitz & Gary Lane on possible U.S. actions. CBN helps families at Shalva Center.

item.description: Negotiations continue in Geneva. Plus, framing the narrative: Avi Abelow analyzes debate tactics used by Tucker Carlson in speaking w/Ambassador Huckabee. Dumisani Washington highlights African nations in the balance regarding Israel and Zionism.

item.title: Alcohol Almost Destroyed Everything! Until God Stepped In
item.description: Alcohol abuse destroyed a police officer's family and nearly his life as he lay in a coma, getting more than medical staff were offering.

item.description: Pres.Trump's Board of Peace meets in Washington amid escalating threats of war in Middle East. Analysis: Karys Rhea on the hijacking of conservatism in the US, Stahl & Petitte on the Tucker Carlson/Amb. Huckabee interview. Prayers at Ancient Shiloh.

item.title: CBN Report Inside Gaza: Hamas Still Armed and Dangerous | Jerusalem Dateline - 2
item.description: Paul Petitte reports from Gaza on tenuous ceasefire. PM Netanyahu skeptical about Iran talks, concerned about Israel's security. U.S. lawmakers mobilize against Sharia law. The Jerusalem Academy of Music & Dance - where students make music, not war.

item.title: When the Storm Passed, Help Arrived
item.description: Teresa and her family lost their roof after Hurricane Erick hit Mexico. Thanks to Operation Blessing, more than 800 metal sheets will be provided to help families rebuild their roofs.
